node.html: • Part of Assessment Integrity Team, contribution in pipeline.

• Collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional teams across multiple time zones, fostering a productive environment that led to a remarkable 15% reduction in project timelines.
  • Spearheaded Android app design & development for EPIC projects, delivering scalable in-car audio solutions, while ensuring responsiveness of applications across various display resolutions.
  • Quickly adapted to Compose migrating from XML, ensuring the seamless handover of concept work to the global team, reducing implementation time by 45%.

• Achieved seamless migration of client-hosted logic to Checkout-Fee Calculator, reducing errors and boosting processing speed by 20%, resulting in enriched maintainability and faster delivery times.
  • Implemented an advanced SERP logging system, slashing decision-making time by 37% and identifying the areas for improvement, streamlining analysis & aligning logging capabilities across mobile platforms.
  • Revamped Item Detail page UI, resulting in 16% reduction in inquiries & higher user satisfaction, simplifying information retrieval for customers and alleviating burden on customer support team.

• Created couple of POCs on GitHub Actions Template’s version migration, involving intensive research on git internals, actions platform and event sourcing pattern.
  • Implemented the POCs through a command line app integrated with GitHub CLI (an open-source project) in Golang.
  • Authored 5+ GitHub Action’s Template for publishing to marketplace along with its technical documentations.

• Modernized real-time communication by integrating it with Quickblox API and enabled payments through Stripe.
  • Designed and Developed application logic for couple of mobile apps using Android SDK and Java for couple of international clients.
  • Involved in the Development of various CRUD functionality on Firebase Firestore and RealtimeDB.

• Worked on improving the Application architecture to improve it performance and optimizing it for scale.
  • Built and shipped muliple MVP prototypes for startups
  • Designed clean and minimal user centric UI's in Figma and converted them to XML later.

• Created app Database structures that integrated them with various functionality.
  • Architected and implemented authentication system, localization and integrated the App with QR code to automate manual work along with designing the Subscription module.
  • Worked with Android Location Services in foreground and background to provide realtime location updates with 90% accuracy.
